movies.title: The End of Evangelion
movies.Plot: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995).

movies.title: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow
movies.Plot: Naruto and his team are hired to protect a young actress from three rogue warriors in the Land of the Snow.

movies.title: One Piece: Episode of Alabasta

movies.title: Naruto Shippuden: The Movie
movies.Plot: A powerful spirit that once threatened to destroy the world is back! Naruto's mission is to protect a priestess named Shion, who is the only one with the power to seal away the monster.

movies.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
movies.Plot: Yugi Moto solves an Ancient Egyptian Puzzle and brings forth a dark and powerful alter ego. Whenever he and his friends are threatened by evil in Duel Monster Card Game, this alter ego breaks out to save them.

movies.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
movies.Plot: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

movies.title: InuYasha
movies.Plot: The past catches up with the world of Inuyasha and Kagome's present in a form they could never have anticipated.

movies.title: KenIchi: The Mightiest Disciple
movies.Plot: "Weak Legs" Kenichi Shirahama would rather spend his time reading self improvement books than fighting.

movies.title: Naruto
movies.Plot: Naruto, Kakashi, Sakura, and Rock Lee are assigned to protect Michiru, the prince of the Land of the Moon, while he travel the world. The prince purchased a tiger Sham and the whole circus, which became the team's protection.

movies.title: Gurren Lagann

movies.Plot: Max Taylor is the son of paleontologist Dr Spike Taylor and is a fan of dinosaurs.

movies.title: Magi

movies.Plot: Hinata Hyuga's younger sister has been kidnapped, so Naruto must do what he can to save her.

movies.title: Castlevania

movies.Plot: In this anime series, scientists hope "new humans" will create universal peace, but they're kidnapped by an evil group with very different plans.

movies.title: revisions

movies.title: One Piece Fan Letter
movies.Plot: Two years after the Paramount War, the Straw Hats are about to reunite on the Sabaody Archipelago. At the same time, a girl who is head over heels for Nami is trying to hand a fan letter to her before the group leaves the island.

movies.title: Tougen Anki
movies.Plot: When Shiki's father is killed, he discovers he has demon ancestry and enters a secret war going on between demons and heroes.

movies.title: YAIBA: Samurai Legend
movies.Plot: The series follows the titular Yaiba Kurogane a samurai boy inspired by Miyamoto Musashi, the real-life swordsman who made the Hyoho Niten Ichi-ryu style of two-sword fighting and wrote The Book of Five Rings classic on military s...

movies.title: My Hero Academia: You're Next
movies.Plot: Deku, Bakugo, Todoroki and the rest of U.A. High Class 1-A must face off against Dark Might and the obscure crime organisation under his control, the Gollini Family.
